monsters.name: Adult Red Dragon
monsters.skills: Acrobatics +23, Arcana +25, Athletics +29, Deception +25, Diplomacy +25, Intimidation +27, Stealth +23
monsters.specialDef: +1 status to all saves vs. magic

abilities.Dragon Heat: [aura] - (arcane, aura, evocation, fire); 5 feet, 3d6 fire damage (DC 30 basic Reflex)
abilities.Jaws: [one-action] melee +29 [+24/+19] (fire, magical, reach 15 feet), Damage 3d12+15 piercing plus 2d6 fire
abilities.Claw: [one-action] melee +29 [+25/+21] (agile, magical, reach 10 feet), Damage 3d10+15 slashing
abilities.Wing: [one-action] wing +27 [+23/+19] (agile, magical, reach 15 feet), Damage 2d10+13 slashing
abilities.Breath Weapon: [two-actions] (arcane, evocation, fire) The dragon breathes a blast of flame that deals 15d6 fire damage in a 50-foot cone (DC 36 basic Reflex save). It can't use Breath Weapon again for 1d4 rounds.
abilities.Draconic Frenzy: [two-actions] The dragon makes two claw Strikes and one wing Strike in any order.
abilities.Draconic Momentum: The dragon recharges its Breath Weapon whenever it scores a critical hit with a Strike.
